feed.title: Memories Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Memories: v7.5.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

Minor feature release https://github.com/pulsejet/memories/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#v750---2025-02-26 Support for Nextcloud 31

  • Display album metadata (location field, collaborators) by @jovanbulck in https://github.com/pulsejet/memories/pull/1245
  • Devcontainer by @jovanbulck in https://github.com/pulsejet/memories/pull/1311
  • Update install.md with postgresql >=v15 by @Chaos99 in https://github.com/pulsejet/memories/pull/1313
  • Exif: dispatch nodeWrittenEvent by @rolandinus in https://github.com/pulsejet/memories/pull/1331
  • Implement merge person/clusters on Face recognition backend. Part of â€¦ by @matiasdelellis in https://github.com/pulsejet/memories/pull/1339
  • feat: auto-repeat live photos by @jovanbulck in https://github.com/pulsejet/memories/pull/1349
  • fix: autoplay successive live photos by @jovanbulck in https://github.com/pulsejet/memories/pull/1350
  • Add copy and "move and organise" features by @AiroPi in https://github.com/pulsejet/memories/pull/1143

New Contributors

  • @jovanbulck made their first contribution in https://github.com/pulsejet/memories/pull/1245
  • @Chaos99 made their first contribution in https://github.com/pulsejet/memories/pull/1313
  • @rolandinus made their first contribution in https://github.com/pulsejet/memories/pull/1331
  • @AiroPi made their first contribution in https://github.com/pulsejet/memories/pull/1143

Full Changelog: https://github.com/pulsejet/memories/compare/v7.4.1...v7.5.0

entry.title: New release for Memories: v7.5.1
entry.content:
Hotfix for update issues with 7.5.0

Please run occ maintenance:repair after the upgrade is complete.

https://github.com/pulsejet/memories/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#v751---2025-02-26

Full Changelog: https://github.com/pulsejet/memories/compare/v7.5.0...v7.5.1

entry.title: New release for Memories: v7.5.2
entry.content:
Second hotfix release for v7.5, fixing an issue with the new (more efficient) exiftool comms.

Note: Starting this release, all 500 errors will produce a log entry. If you see new error logs related to Memories, please report them.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/pulsejet/memories/compare/v7.5.1...v7.5.2
